name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ecommerce Inspector for Shopify and more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful inspector, inspect products listings other datapoints about Ecommerce stores - Shopify included

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension, you are capable to download a list of products from any Shopify store, and get it as csv file.

Due-diligence on products before buy a store? Use this extension!
Need to get all competitor products? Use this extension!
Need to get a list of product images? Use this extension!
